name: acu jacket
description: A tough jacket with lots of pockets.  Favored by the military. This jacket is in the old urban digital pattern.

name: acu pants
description: A tough pair of pants lined with pockets.  Favored by the military. These pants are in the old urban digital pattern

name: pasgt helmet
description: A heavy kevlar helmet used by the US military untill the mid 2000's. It provides protection from all kinds of damage.

name: pasgt helmet (green cover)
description: A heavy kevlar helmet used by the US military untill the mid 2000's. It provides protection from all kinds of damage. This helmet has a green helmet cover.

name: pasgt helmet (patchwork cover)
description: A heavy kevlar helmet used by the US military untill the mid 2000's. It provides protection from all kinds of damage. This helmet has a homemade patchwork cover.

name: pasgt helmet (urban digital cover)
description: A heavy kevlar helmet used by the US military untill the mid 2000's. It provides protection from all kinds of damage. This helmet has an urban digital cover.

name: pasgt helmet (multicam cover)
description: A heavy kevlar helmet used by the US military untill the mid 2000's. It provides protection from all kinds of damage. This helmet has a multicam cover.

name: IOTV (ucp) (empty)
description: An Improved Outer Tactical Vest in urban digital.  It has pouches for extra armor inserts, but without them provides little more protection over a regular vest.

name: IOTV (ucp) (Kevlar plates)
description: An Improved Outer Tactical Vest in urban digital.  Kevlar SAPPI plates have been inserted to improve its protection.

name: IOTV (ucp) (ceramic plates)
description: An Improved Outer Tactical Vest in urban digital.  Ceramic plates have been inserted to improve its protection.

name: IOTV (ucp) (hard plates)
description: An Improved Outer Tactical Vest in urban digital.  hardened SAPPI plates have been inserted to improve its protection.

name: IOTV (ucp) (steel plating)
description: An Improved Outer Tactical Vest in urban digital.  Steel strike plates have been inserted to improve its protection.

name: IOTV (ucp) (superalloy plates)
description: An Improved Outer Tactical Vest in urban digital.  Superalloy SAPPI plates have been inserted to improve its protection.

name: IOTV mk2 (ucp) (empty)
description: An Improved Outer Tactical Vest mk2 in urban digital.  The IOTV mk2 is the heavy version of the regular IOTV. It's has twice the armour plating and twice the storage capacity, but it's twice as encumbering and a lot heavier as a result.

name: IOTV mk2 (ucp) (Kevlar plates)
description: An Improved Outer Tactical Vest mk2 in urban digital.  The IOTV mk2 is the heavy version of the regular IOTV. It's has twice the armour plating and twice the storage capacity, but it's twice as encumbering and a lot heavier as a result.  Kevlar SAPPI plates have been inserted to improve its protection.

name: T.A.L.O.S exosuit
//: the exosuit was just reaching a point where it could be issued out to combat units, as such it won't spawn on military personal and can only be obtained from military sites
description: The T.A.L.O.S (Tactical Assault Light Operator Suit) is an exprimental exosuit devloped for military use. It uses a revolutionary new hybrid armour system composed of both kevlar and non-newtonian metalic liquids to distribute the force of an impact. It's also has an incorperated exoskeleton that increases the operational capacity of the wearer. It is powered by the wearers movement.

name: T.A.L.O.S exosuit helmet
description: The T.A.L.O.S exosuit helmet is designed to inform the wearer of all mission critical information and protect them from all hazards.

name: IIa police vest
description: A standard issue level IIa police vest commonly issued to regular police. It isn't very protective, but it's better that nothing.

name: IIIa police vest
description: A standard issue level IIIa police vest commonly issued to swat teams. It's twice as protective as a standard IIa vest.
